title: Thriller (song)
summary: "Thriller" is a song by the American singer Michael Jackson. It was released as a single by Epic Records in November 1983 in the UK, and on January 23, 1984, in the U.S., as the seventh and final single from Jackson's sixth studio album of the same name.[2] "Thriller" is a mix of disco and funk. The song was produced by Quincy Jones and written by Rod Temperton, who wanted to write a theatrical song to suit Jackson's love of film. The music and lyrics evoke horror films, with sound effects such as thunder, footsteps, and wind. It ends with a spoken-word sequence performed by horror actor Vincent Price.
